Business Aviation Newsletter: March 2015
Don't Forget Your TCAS 7.1 Upgrade
The December 2015 European Union mandate is quickly approaching. If you're flying in EU airspace, make sure to upgrade your aircraft at the earliest opportunity to avoid possible end-of-year installation capacity issues.
Learn more <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/tcas71upgrade>
___________________________________________________________
Introducing the Strategic Sales Team
Our new Strategic Sales Team is designed to support sales of retrofits, modifications and upgrades (RMUs). They concentrate on a smaller portfolio and utilize their specific skills to accelerate sales and support your needs.
Learn more <https://pages3.honeywell.com/Strategicsales.html>
___________________________________________________________
The Direct Access App Got an Upgrade
Direct Access, one of our convenient mobile apps, provides access to vital services at your fingertips. We recently made improvements to the user interface, navigation and contact functions so it is easier to use than ever.
Learn more <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/direct-access-app-upgrades>
___________________________________________________________
New Online Technical Support Tool
Our new support website offers 24/7 answers to your technical questions. Search for technical solutions, view "how-to" videos and access useful tools and information on a wide range of subjects relevant to your equipment.
Learn more <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/onlinetechnicalsupport>
___________________________________________________________
The Gold Standard of Avionics Protection
Avoid downtime and save money with HAPP Gold. This extended warranty program offers the full coverage of our standard HAPP plan as well as coverage for additional charges related to necessary avionics repairs.
Learn more <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/maintenance-and-monitoring/aftermarket-services/happ>
___________________________________________________________
Join us at AEA 2015
We are excited to be a part of the AEA International Convention & Trade Show taking place April 8-11 in Dallas, TX. Stop by Booth 101 for product demos and one-on-one time with Honeywell and BendixKing representatives.
Learn more <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/events/aea-international-convention-trade-show>
___________________________________________________________
ABACE 2015 in Shanghai
The Asian Business Aviation Conference & Exhibition (ABACE) is the region’s largest event showcasing business aviation products and services. We will join over 150 exhibitors to display the latest in aviation equipment.
Learn more <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/events/abace>
___________________________________________________________
Get the Latest Helicopter News
What's your helicopter mission? Whether you're looking for the latest in efficiency, connectivity or safety, stay up-to-date with the quarterly Honeywell Helicopter Newsletter.
Learn more <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/helicopter-newsletter-q1-2015>
